title: Bronze/Silver Playahs
body:
I play support thresh and need a good adc and jungle
Holla your username and I'll add you

replies.body: hey bro, i play top, mid and a bit of ADC if ya want to add me Dylan0901 cheers. B4 climbing quickly to B3
um me or them btw my irl name is dylan but spelled diffrently :D ign Nothing bots
im b4 but i wouldnt call me good but im like a on and off player good sometimes and bad sometimes
I main jungle and slowly climbing my way out of Bronze 4, half way to B3 atm, need solid team mates. Hit me up :)
